roboRallyPackage.pathFindingClasses

Class DijkstraSP

  • java.lang.Object
    • roboRallyPackage.pathFindingClasses.DijkstraSP

  • public class DijkstraSP
extends java.lang.Object
    Dijkstra's algorithm. Computes the shortest path tree. Assumes all weights are nonnegative.
    Version:
    26 april 2012
    Author:
    Jonas Schouterden (r0260385) & Nele Rober (r0262954) Bachelor Ingenieurswetenschappen, KULeuven

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DijkstraSP(EdgeWeightedDigraph G, int s)
      Initializes a new Dijkstra Shortest Path with a given digraph and a vertex representing the starting point.

      Returns the length of the shortest path from s to v

      Checks whether there is a path from s to v.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DijkstraSP

        public DijkstraSP(EdgeWeightedDigraph G,
          int s)
        Initializes a new Dijkstra Shortest Path with a given digraph and a vertex representing the starting point.
        Parameters:
        G - The edge-weighted digraph that represents the gameboard.
        s - An integer that represents the starting point.

    • Method Detail

      • distTo

        public double distTo(int v)
        Returns the length of the shortest path from s to v
        Parameters:
        v - An integer that represents the position to calculate the distance to.
        Returns:
        ... | distTo[v]

      • hasPathTo

        public boolean hasPathTo(int v)
        Checks whether there is a path from s to v.
        Parameters:
        v - An integer that represents the position to check the way to.
        Returns:
        ... | distTo[v] < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY

      • pathTo

        public java.lang.Iterable<DirectedEdge> pathTo(int v)
        Returns the shortest path from s to v as an Iterable. Returns null if no such path is found.
        Parameters:
        v - An integer that represents the position to calculate the shortest path to.
        Returns:
        ... | if (!hasPathTo(v)) then result == null
